publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2966# Maureen Macmillan: Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the announcement of the 90-day consultation period on the future of the Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach paper mill; believes that management should do all that it can to diversify into another paper product; further believes that it is essential to keep this industrial capacity in Lochaber, both in terms of the site and the skilled and hard-working workforce, and considers that the Scottish Executive should do all it can to attract another operator for the mill should Arjo Wiggins cease production.

S2M-2966# Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill (lodged on 15 June 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Eleanor Scott*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Dr Jean Turner*, Michael McMahon*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, John Home Robertson*

S2M-2966 # Maureen Macmillan: Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the announcement of the 90-day consultation period on the future of the Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach paper mill; believes that management should do all that it can to diversify into another paper product; further believes that it is essential to keep this industrial capacity in Lochaber, both in terms of the site and the skilled and hard-working workforce, and considers that the Scottish Executive should do all it can to attract another operator for the mill should Arjo Wiggins cease production. Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Ms Sandra White, Mr Frank McAveety, Eleanor Scott, Jackie Baillie, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Dr Jean Turner, Michael McMahon, Mrs Mary Mulligan, John Home Robertson, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2966 #Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill (lodged on 15 June 2005) Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2966 #Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill (lodged on 15 June 2005) Mary Scanlon*
S2M-2966 #Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill (lodged on 15 June 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Fergus Ewing*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-2966 #Arjo Wiggins’ Corpach Paper Mill (lodged on 15 June 2005) Brian Adam* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
